items.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
items.summary: GPT-5 powers an autonomous laboratory agent that uses closed-loop experimentation to optimize protein synthesis, demonstrating real-world agent applications in scientific domains.

items.title: Introducing Trusted Access for Cyber
items.summary: OpenAI introduces a trust-based framework for cyber capabilities that includes safeguards against misuse, relevant to agent safety and governance in sensitive domains.

items.title: Introducing OpenAI Frontier
items.summary: OpenAI Frontier is an enterprise platform specifically designed for building, deploying, and managing AI agents with governance features like shared context, permissions, and onboarding.

items.title: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex
items.summary: GPT-5.3-Codex is positioned as a Codex-native agent that supports long-horizon, real-world technical work by pairing advanced coding with general reasoning abilities.

items.title: GPT-5.3-Codex System Card
items.summary: GPT-5.3-Codex combines frontier coding performance with reasoning capabilities, representing the most capable agentic coding model for complex development tasks.

items.title: Nemotron ColEmbed V2: Raising the Bar for Multimodal Retrieval with ViDoRe V3’s Top Model
items.summary: NVIDIA's Nemotron ColEmbed V2 achieves top performance on ViDoRe V3 benchmark for multimodal retrieval, advancing RAG capabilities for agent systems.

items.title: Unlocking the Codex harness: how we built the App Server
items.summary: Technical deep-dive on the Codex App Server's bidirectional JSON-RPC API that enables embedding Codex agents with streaming progress, tool use, approvals, and diff capabilities.

items.title: Community Evals: Because we're done trusting black-box leaderboards over the community
items.summary: Hugging Face introduces Community Evals as an alternative to black-box leaderboards, providing transparent evaluation methods relevant to agent benchmarking and assessment.

items.title: Snowflake and OpenAI partner to bring frontier intelligence to enterprise data
items.summary: OpenAI and Snowflake partner in a $200M agreement to enable AI agents and insights directly within Snowflake's enterprise data platform.

items.title: Introducing the Codex app
items.summary: OpenAI launches Codex app for macOS featuring multiple agents, parallel workflows, and long-running tasks for AI-powered software development.

items.title: January 2026: LangChain Newsletter
items.summary: LangChain newsletter covering latest product updates and content from the leading agent framework team, likely including new features, integrations, and community developments.

items.title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control
items.summary: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos Policy, a new framework for advanced robot control that bridges AI agent decision-making with robotic systems.

items.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
items.summary: OpenAI shares technical details of their internal data agent built with GPT-5, Codex, and memory systems for reasoning over large datasets and delivering insights.

items.title: Retiring GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT
items.summary: OpenAI announces retirement of older models including GPT-4o, GPT-4.1 variants, and o4-mini from ChatGPT on February 13, 2026. This affects model availability for agent developers using these models in their systems.

items.title: Introducing Daggr: Chain apps programmatically, inspect visually
items.summary: Hugging Face launches Daggr, a tool for programmatically chaining AI applications with visual inspection capabilities for agent workflow development.

items.title: Context Management for Deep Agents
items.summary: LangChain introduces context management techniques for deep agents to prevent context rot and handle finite memory constraints as agent task lengths grow. The post covers practical approaches for managing context in long-running agent workflows.

items.title: Context Management for Deep Agents
items.summary: LangChain introduces context management techniques for deep agents to prevent context rot and handle LLMs' finite memory constraints as agents tackle longer tasks.

items.title: Keeping your data safe when an AI agent clicks a link
items.summary: OpenAI describes safety mechanisms to protect user data when AI agents click links, including safeguards against URL-based data exfiltration and prompt injection attacks.

items.title: Unlocking Agentic RL Training for GPT-OSS: A Practical Retrospective
items.summary: LinkedIn shares practical insights on implementing agentic reinforcement learning training for GPT-OSS, covering real-world challenges and solutions for agent training.

items.title: Powering tax donations with AI powered personalized recommendations
items.summary: TRUSTBANK implemented a multi-agent system using OpenAI models for personalized recommendations, demonstrating practical multi-agent architecture for recommendation engines.
